problem: Would someone with back pain enjoy picking strawberries?
gt_solution:
Back pain may be worsened by repeated bending at the waist.
Strawberries grow very close to the ground.
facts: Back pain may be worsened by repeated bending at the waist.
Strawberries grow very close to the ground.
decomposition: What are some common body postures that can aggravate back pain?
At which position relative to the ground do strawberries grow?
What posture would one have to assume to reach #2?
